about.header-lead: What we can do for your pet
about.p1: Naty Style is the place where dogs and cats are pampered with the best beauty treatments. Our pet loving, qualified personel will help you give your pet the royal treatment they deserve.
about.p2: Also our clients can choose to buy accesories and food for their pets from our pet-shop situated inside the building at the best prices on the market.
advantages.header: Why should you choose Naty Style?
advantages.header-lead: We are not just grooming your pet, we treat him like he is ours!
advantages.s1: We put hard work into it so we can guarantee you a spot as soon as possible!
advantages.s2: We treat your pet as ours in a clean and tide environment with desinfected tools on each grooming session.
advantages.s3: We have a service for each type of pet so rest assured he will be satisfied.
advantages.s4: You don't have to wait for us, you can leave your pet at the saloon and we will call you as soon as he is ready.
testimonials.header-lead: This is what the clients that used Invoicecash say about us
contact.form.header-lead: Send us a message and we will contact you shortly
contact.form.name: Your name
header.span1: The newest grooming saloon in Constanta
header.span2: Using our latest generation equipments we aim to provide your pet with a royal service
header.span3: Our proprietary products sold from our pet shop are the highest quality, satifying our non speaking pet friends.
error.fill-all-fields: Please, fill in all the fields.
error.password.invalid: The password must contain at least one Upper case letter, one lower case letter, a number, a special character and to be between 8 and 50 characters long.
cookies.text: This site uses cookies to deliver you the best user experience possible. You can read more about cookies clicking on the link below.
order-lead: Book a session for your pet in our grooming saloon. So that he will feel much better with a clean and tide fur and a new haircut. We treat your pets as it is ours. We kindly wait for you!
